title: Sherry mincemeat
ingredients: ['100g raisins', '100g sultanas', '100g currants', '100g dried cranberries', '100g candied orange peel', '1 firm red apple, skin left on, cored and finely diced', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '3 tablespoons orange or apple juice', '2 teaspoons ground cloves', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '100g butter, softened', '6 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon potato flour (or plain flour)', '50g chopped almonds', '200ml sherry']
